author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Attempt to make a flat silicon file for HGNose descriptiopn - first step to make the next version of HFNose

#### PR validation:

The flat file is created. The next step will be to use this file to make a new version of HGNose along with the V18 version of HGCal

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phas2-HGX350B Attempt to make a flat silicon file for HGNose descriptiopn - first step to make the next version of HFNose
